title: Merch store question :)
body:
Hello!

I know I'm simply just impatient but couldn't see info on when the store will be shipping stuff after the Christmas break.

Any idea on when my swaggy loots shall be shipped? (I just want an idea of time)

Ps I'm super excited to hug my very own tibbers!

Thanks! :)

replies.body:
Hey OCG LittleKazNz,

Not sure about that one sorry, but you can definitely send in a player support request [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Just select the "I have a question about the new physical merch store" category.
